vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Specific Use Permit for an open-enrollment charter school on property zoned Area A within Planned Development District No. 487, on the north line of West 9th Street, between North Polk Street and North Tyler Street
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval, for five-year period, subject to a site plan, a traffic management plan, and conditions
Z212-121(MP)
